notifications.title: Notifications
notifications.description: Stay updated with your health appointments
notifications.no_notifications_description: You'll receive notifications for appointments, account updates, and other important information.

approval.title: Account Approved
approval.message: Congratulations! Your account has been approved. You can now book appointments and access all features.

rejection.title: Account Application Review
rejection.message: Your account application has been reviewed. Please contact the health office for more information.

appointment_reminder.title: Upcoming Appointment Reminder
appointment_reminder.message: You have an appointment on {date} at {time}. Please arrive 15 minutes early.

cancellation.title: Appointment Cancelled
cancellation.message: Your appointment scheduled for {date} at {time} has been cancelled. {reason}

feedback_request.title: Share Your Feedback
feedback_request.message: How was your recent appointment? We'd love to hear your feedback to improve our services.

general.title: Notification
general.message: You have a new notification from Panabo City Health Office.

feedback.title: Feedback
feedback.description: Share your experience and view your feedback history
feedback.eligible_description: You can submit feedback within 7 days of appointment completion.
feedback.no_eligible_description: You don't have any completed appointments eligible for feedback at this time.
feedback.history_description: View all your submitted feedback and admin responses.
feedback.no_feedback_description: You haven't submitted any feedback yet.

disease_surveillance.title: Disease Surveillance
disease_surveillance.description: Track disease outbreaks and trends in Panabo City

hero.title: Providing an Exceptional Patient Experience
hero.subtitle: Welcome, where exceptional patient experiences are our priority. With compassionate care, state-of-the-art facilities, and a patient-centered approach, we're dedicated to your well-being. Trust us with your health and experience the difference.

services_section.title: Our Special Service
services_section.description: Beyond simply providing medical care and treatments, our commitment lies in delivering unparalleled service tailored to your unique needs.

healthcard.title: Health Card
healthcard.description: Accurate Diagnostics, Swift Results: Experience top-notch Laboratory Testing at our facility.

hiv.title: HIV
hiv.description: Our thorough assessments and expert evaluations help you stay proactive about your health.

pregnancy.title: Pregnancy
pregnancy.description: Experience comprehensive oral care with Dentistry. Trust us to keep your smile healthy and bright.

about.title: About Us
about.paragraph1: Welcome to our healthcare website, your one-stop destination for reliable and comprehensive health care information. We are committed to promoting wellness and providing valuable resources to empower you on your health journey.
about.paragraph2: Explore our extensive collection of expertly written articles and guides covering a wide range of health topics. From understanding common medical conditions to tips for maintaining a healthy lifestyle, our content is designed to educate, inspire, and support you in making informed choices for your health.
about.paragraph3: Discover practical health tips and lifestyle advice to optimize your physical and mental well-being. We believe that small changes can lead to significant improvements in your quality of life, and we're here to guide you on your path to a healthier and happier you.

whychoose.title: Why Choose Us
whychoose.subtitle: With a steadfast commitment to your well-being, our team of highly trained healthcare professionals ensures that you receive nothing short of exceptional patient experiences.

intensivecare.title: Intensive Care
intensivecare.description: Our Intensive Care Unit is equipped with advanced technology and staffed by team of professionals

ambulance.title: Free Ambulance Car
ambulance.description: A compassionate initiative to prioritize your health and well-being without any financial burden.

medicalsurgical.title: Medical and Surgical
medicalsurgical.description: Our Medical and Surgical services offer advanced healthcare solutions to address medical needs.

footer.description: We are honored to be a part of your healthcare journey and committed to delivering compassionate, personalized, and top-notch care every step of the way.
footer.trust: Trust us with your health, and let us work together to achieve the best possible outcomes for you and your loved ones.
